I saw the other reviews talking about part-timers being rude to customers. When I tried few days ago during lunchtime the chef was doing everything including the counter, cleaning, cooking, and taking orders. The 11000won combo is probably one of the cheapest for the taste so I thought it was weird when I saw the low rating. I would like to give the chef 5 stars to cheer him on.
